text: For the LORD had told Moses,
This is what the king said: ‘Blessed be the LORD, the God of Israel, who has this day provided one to sit upon my throne, so that I see it with my own eyes.’”
Samlah died and Shaul from Rehoboth on the Euphrates succeeded him as king.
to leave their sons uncircumcised, and to defile themselves with every kind of impurity and abomination;
For he has looked upon his handmaid’s lowliness; behold, from now on will all ages call me blessed.
Nathanael said to him, “How do you know me?” Jesus answered and said to him, “Before Philip called you, I saw you under the fig tree.”
